texts.name: Mithra
texts.biography: Hidden in woods near the land of Deyja, Mithra incredible ability to destroy undead made her popular among sorceresses. After losing a battle against liches, she took refuge within Shayan's kingdom to teaches magic.

specialty.name: Enchanter
specialty.description:
{Enchanter}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Sorceress or Enchanters for each level attained after 5th level.
